content: express yourself with a comfy & colorful cardi designed by sarah zimmerman from repeat crafter me this easy crochet cardigan is made up of two hexagons using the basic double_crochet stitch the two hexagons fold to make the sleeves and body of the cardigan simply stitch the seam together for an easy statement piece sarah designed this bright and delightful pattern using our well-loved retro stripe shade for a project that delivers ultimate retro flair materials red heart® super saver® stripes™ 5 oz/141 g 236 yds/215 m sizes s m l xl 2xl retro stripe 4971 3 4 4 5 6 balls finished chest s 36 91 5 cm m 43 109 cm l 45 114 5 cm xl 48 122 cm 2xl 50 127 cm
